name: Five Nights at Jack-O-Freddy's: The Haunted Attraction
name_original: Five Nights at Jack-O-Freddy's: The Haunted Attraction
description: It's 2003, you recently graduated Collage and looking for a job. While reading the newspaper, you discovered that Jack-O-Freddy's Haunted Attraction is reopening in a few days and are looking for a security guard, you apply and your shift begins at 12 AM. At first it seems easy, "watch over the place and make sure no one steals anything," Until some of the animatronics begin to move around...
